channel.title: Growth Strategy on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Growth Strategy on FinanClub

item.title: KSS
item.description: score:19 Chances: Kohl’s beats profit estimates on cost cuts and leaner inventory. Earnings surpass estimates, maintains full-year guidance. Strategic efforts aiding growth in Kohl’s. Back-to-school shopping convenience and affordable prices. Positive takeaways from Q2 earnings call. Risks: Profits plunge more than 50% annually on weak sales.

item.title: GFI
item.description: score:9 Chances: Gold Fields reported earnings decline for the first half of the year due to lower volumes sold and higher operating costs. The company’s focus on pursuing growth by building new mines and searching for new gold deposits indicates a strategic approach to expansion.
